entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking change in environment variable configuration prefix support in dotnet 6 #61577
  • Enabled AOT blazor Wasm Precompilation fails. #61565
  • WriteEventCore with DateTime has changed behavior in .Net 6.0 #61563
  • Consider using a faster memset #61561
  • MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61560

Closed

  • Building .NET Core 3.0 RTM on FreeBSD #31039
    Future
  • System.Text.Json deserialization bug #61550
  • [mono][aot] Static virtual interface methods do not work with generic sharing #54910
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete `impCheckForNullPointer` #61576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update workflow docs to indicate ARM64 macOS works #61575
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix range checks for "i >= 0 && i < cns" patterns #61569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Improve System.Speech trimmability #61566
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Extend RegexCharClass.Canonicalize range inversion optimization #61562
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix CharInClass reference in regex emitter #61559
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Enable 54910 tests #61564
    community-contribution
  • Add [Fact] attributes to JIT regression tests #61540
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes to methodical JIT tests #61536
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes on TypeGeneratorTests #61534
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable new analyzers in global configs #60914
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1468915 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/5.0] Credscan addition to #61371 #61511
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [arm64] JIT: Add with sign/zero extend #61549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Remove the "anything + null => null" optimization #61518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.Default #61434
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • ConcurrentBag AddRange proposal implementation #61557
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
